text: Hey Arlo, Iâ€™ve run into some similar struggles regarding the clients, though I lean towards the Python ones. My best suggestion is having a local version of the package that you can explore, as some of the examples in the docs do not line up with the package structure. Specifically I often need to change the `HubSpotClient.crm.objects...` portions.
Does HubDB has version control? is there a way to access this, other than simply reverting to last publish?
